segments.text: Good morning , sir . Sorry to disturb you . May I make up the room now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . We're on our way out , so we put the ' make up ' sign on . Could you bring us some towels and hangers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , sir . Everything will be ready when you come back .
segments.speaker: S1
